column5: What is the best map chip to use in a Lowrance LCX for Rainy Lake??

Navionics Canada chip. It will provide detail of both sides. I am not sure if the north chip gives you detail. On my LCX111CHD, the one that was "allegedly" preloaded with every lake in the free world, doesn't have any detail on the Canadian side. I bought the Canada chip. This one also provides detailed info of the entire Rainy watershed, again on both sides.
Last year I purchased the Lake of the Woods 2K map from Navionics. The chip includes all of Rainy Lake. It worked well for me when I used the chip on Rainy last summer. Like2Fish
